name: Pokemon Showdown Skin - Blue Edition (Castgurl)
description: Here is the official and final release of my Pokemon Showdown Blue Edition Skin - it has been refined and tweaked to a much more polished piece. I hope you like it! :)
obsoletion_message: The skin is back up - I was doing a major overhaul on it. :)
additional_info:
3/29/16 - Pokemon Showdown - Blue Edition Final release

This will be the very last major edit I will do for this skin. I have gone through each section of the code and retweaked anything and nearly everything to make it even more polished.

Added:
Custom hover backgrounds - you'll see what I mean.
Custom website logo - hover effect included.
Much smoother transitions for the hovering effect on buttons.
Same applies to battle controls.
Added more refined looks overall
Fixed any issues with fonts
Fixed any issues with texts

Any changes that I do happen to make will be font based only. Thank you so much for everyone that has tried this skin!

One major edition I will add:
Custom messages for the backgrounds by me - this will be in the testing phases until then. :)


3/19/16  **THE FOLLOWING FIXES HAVE BEEN MADE**

Fixed the text input problem in team builder, chat and more. The text when inputting and hovering over it are now the correct color.

Tweaked the hovering buttons near the team builder chart with the custom fonts as well, you can now see them.

Added a much more toned down background to team builder - makes it a LOT easier to see the rows of moves/items/etc when on that page.

Replay section is fixed.

Battle chat has a background.

Animated Blastoise icon is back - no idea why the other one wasn't showing up even on my end.
------------------
3/4/2016 - Added the code to display the custom fonts without downloading them (I had to switch a few to a different one) All custom fonts should display without needing to install anything besides the style. I will go over it again to make sure I caught everything.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3/2/2016 - Green and Red Editions are available for download as well guys! Here are the direct links:
Pokemon Showdown - Red Edition: https://userstyles.org/styles/124999/pokemon-showdown-skin-red-edition-regdrags
Pokemon Showdown - Green Edition: https://userstyles.org/styles/124666/pokemon-showdown-skin-green-edition-regdrags
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*Changed a font style to another one - download and install the Prototype font to have it displayed correctly--->https://dl.dropbox.com/s/fag1ofw0u8w2bmr/Prototype.ttf?dl=0

2/24/16 - Changed the Garchomp 'dancing' icon to Blastoise, touched up the background (Looks better now.) and got rid of the Garchomp from the battle controls section - they're now Blastoise. :)

2/19/16 - Added a direct link to the custom fonts, unzip and install according to windows os or mac version.
https://dl.dropbox.com/s/my8maunvdeigqk4/Custom%20Fonts.7z?dl=0


---Credit goes to: 13ulb's Dark Theme - Pokemon Showdown for once again motivating me to edit/make a style of my own based on his/her skin.

---IF you make you own based on my skin, PLEASE refer to me in the description. Thanks!
 
---NOTE: I used custom fonts for this style. You MUST download the follow fonts in order to have them display correct on the website. They can be found easily via a google search. When I am able, I will include a direct download to the fonts.
The fonts are:
Joystick
Bebas
Faucet
Calibri
Engineering Plot

Windows XP - 7 users: Download the fonts. They will be zip files so download a program such as 7Zip to extract them. Extract them to your Desktop. Next - go to: C: ->  Windows  -> Fonts. Make SURE you have admin permissions. Drag and drop/copy and paste fonts to that folder.

Windows 10 users: Simply download. Open the zip file. Double click directly on the font file. A new window will open. From there, click on install and Windows will install the font. 

2/18/16 - Newly released, changes will be made as need.

discussions.name: This could take notes from the Red version.
